CustomField.formula:
CASE(MainLOAStatus__c, "LOA Accepted Awaiting Information","We requested information on " +TEXT(Date_LOA_sent_to_provider__c)&"."&" " +(LOA_Financial_Account__r.Public_Provider_Name__r.Name)& " has told us that we should receive this by " +TEXT(LOA_Expected_Response_Date__c)&"."&" We last chased on " +TEXT(Date_Last_Chased__c)&".",
"Information Received","We are processing information that we received on"&" " +TEXT(DateFirstResponseProvider__c)&".",
"Information rerequested","We have had to re-request information from"&" " +(LOA_Financial_Account__r.Public_Provider_Name__r.Name)&" on " +TEXT(Date_Additional_Information_Requested__c)&"."& " We last chased this on " +TEXT(Date_Last_Chased__c)&".",
"Specialist reviewed","We are processing information that we received on"&" " +TEXT(DateFirstResponseProvider__c)&".",
"LOA Analysis","We have everything we need.",
"Completed","We have everything we need.", ("") )
CustomField.label: Third Email Descriptions
